name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei  2nd solo live ＂Shout in Crisis＂ [USmUfG_-Sn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Promotion for the 'Shout in Crisis' ESSENTIAL PACK merchandise.
Promotion for the 'Shout in Crisis' SPECIAL ITEMS merchandise.
Instructions for using the concert penlight.
Pre-show waiting screen for the live performance.

subtitles.original: ギラギラに光っちゃって
ギラギラに光っちゃって

Attention
"Shout in Crisis" Penlight をお持ちのお客様へ
subtitles.english:
Attention
To customers who have the "Shout in Crisis" Penlight

subtitles.original: 各楽曲のテイスト・演出に合わせてペンライトのカラーを切り替えて、会場演出のお手伝いをお願いします。
subtitles.english: Please help with the venue's production by switching the penlight colors to match each song's taste and staging.

subtitles.original: 持ち手部分のスイッチで推しカラーの BLUE を固定できます。詳しい使用方法は、ペンライト付属の台紙をご確認ください。
subtitles.english: You can fix the BLUE member color with the switch on the handle. For detailed usage instructions, please check the backing card.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Please wait a while until the show starts.
